description: portrait of seated man resting in PL hand beneath his chin; man looks toward his left out of the picture plane
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date and Inscription

see Signed; on back of mount, in pencil: various notes and inscriptions
signed: LRC below image on mount, in pencil: [Nata Piaskowski]; LLC below image on mount, in pencil: [1950]; on back of mount, in black ink and pencil: [1950  Minor White at Edward Westin\'s house.  Vintage print (1950) / (c) Nata Piaskowski  2418  (2 1/4 x 2 1/4 neg. on land)]
title: Minor White at Edward Westin's House
